page.title: 16Brownies and Guides,A. Moor
page.content: The group was begun in 1961 and now hold their meetings in The Topp. The Brownies meet during school term time on Thursdays from 5.30 p.m. to 6.45 p.m. There are three leaders and 17 Brownies. At their meetings they play games, learn songs, learn how to make things, act in plays and prepare for their badges. They are called the {'1st Alston (St. Augustine's) Brownie {Pack'}and take part in some church services and the church bazaar and other money raising efforts for charities. They go away on a pack holiday each year and join with other Brownies in the{Cumbria North-Border {Division}for other activities. The Guides also meet in The Topp on Thursday evenings from 7 p.m. to 8.30 p.m. Their activities are similar to the Brownies' but more suitable for older girls and also include camping.
